mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_conversations (user_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
INSERT INTO chat_messages (conversation_id, message, is_user_message, created_at) VALUES (#{conversationId}, #{message}, #{isUserMessage}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT chat_message_id, conversation_id, message, is_user_message, created_at FROM chat_messages WHERE conversation_id = #{conversationId} ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT chat_conversation_id, user_id, created_at, updated_at FROM chat_conversations WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY updated_at DESC
